assicurativa.title: Insurance Consulting
assicurativa.subtitle: A peaceful and secure future through tailor-made management
assicurativa.description: With Swiss Consult Hub, we offer insurance consulting through our insurance giant partner, designed to guarantee stability and economic security for individuals and companies.
points: All insurance branches, from health and pension insurance for individuals to all insurance for companies.
assicurativa.idealFor: Individuals and companies seeking comprehensive and ongoing protection

immobiliare.title: Real Estate Intermediation and Management
immobiliare.subtitle: Find your ideal space, in Switzerland and abroad
immobiliare.description: Our team of experts accompanies you step by step in finding the perfect housing or investment solution, both in Switzerland and abroad.
points: Customized property search: Whether it's a house, apartment or room, we take care of finding the best options for you.
Support for rentals and purchases: We manage all phases of the transaction, from identifying the property to signing the contract.
International real estate investments: We offer advice for investing in strategic markets such as Switzerland, Italy and other high-yield countries.
Property management: We take care and responsibility for your properties at 360 degrees, guaranteeing you 100% of the services.
immobiliare.idealFor: Those looking for real estate or wanting to invest in the real estate sector

lavorativa.title: Employment and Professional Consulting
lavorativa.subtitle: From search to interview: the job you deserve is one step away.
lavorativa.description:
Our employment consulting is designed for those who want to improve their professional position or find new opportunities in Switzerland and abroad.
We focus on every phase of the search and application process to guarantee you concrete results.
points: Identification of the best job opportunities: We evaluate your profile and identify companies and positions best suited to your skills.
Creation of professional CVs and cover letters: We help you stand out in the Swiss job market with effective, clear and personalized documents.
Interview preparation: We offer coaching sessions to improve your communication skills and face interviews with confidence.
Our goal is to accompany you towards success, making the job market accessible and transparent for you.
lavorativa.idealFor: Professionals seeking new career opportunities in Switzerland

legale.title: Legal Consulting
legale.subtitle: Reliable legal advice for complex situations
legale.description: Facing legal issues can be complex, but with Swiss Consult Hub and our expert partners, you can count on professional support tailored to every situation.
points: Customized consulting: We analyze your situation and propose customized legal solutions to protect your rights.
Contracts and dispute resolution: We support you in drafting and negotiating contracts, as well as managing any legal disputes.
Ongoing legal assistance: We offer legal protection plans that guarantee fast and simplified access to our team of experts.
legale.idealFor: Complex legal situations requiring professional support

commerciale.title: Business Consulting
commerciale.subtitle: Complete support for individuals and businesses
commerciale.description:
Our business consulting is designed for those who want to start a new business or optimize the management of an existing one.
We offer comprehensive assistance for every phase of the entrepreneurial cycle.
points: Business startup: From initial planning to legal establishment, we guide you to start your business smoothly.
Taxation and management: Assistance to individuals for declarations and income verifications, with complete management for companies.
Strategic consulting: We help you improve productivity and identify new growth opportunities.
commerciale.idealFor: Entrepreneurs and companies in startup or growth phase

medica.title: Medical Consulting
medica.subtitle: Privileged Access to Swiss Healthcare Excellence
points: Search and Selection of Specialists: We assist you in identifying the best general practitioners, specialists (e.g. dentists, ophthalmologists, physiotherapists, etc.) and private clinics or hospitals, based on your specific needs and location.
Administrative Support: We guide you in understanding Swiss healthcare procedures, managing documentation and coordinating with your health insurance.
medica.idealFor: Individuals who need access to specialized medical care

creditizia.title: Credit Consulting
creditizia.subtitle: The right financial solutions for you
creditizia.description: Facing the world of credits and leasing can be complex, but with Swiss Consult Hub everything becomes simple and transparent.
points: Customized credits: We help you choose tailor-made financing, thanks to our expert advice.
Competitive leasing: We guide you in choosing the best leasing for vehicles, with solutions adapted to your needs.
Customized consulting: We analyze your needs and find the best solution together with you to achieve your goals, such as buying a property abroad.
creditizia.idealFor: Those seeking financing, leasing or customized credit solutions
